name: Fruit Splash Flower Blossom Candy Garden 3
name_original: Fruit Splash Flower Blossom Candy Garden 3
description:
Fruit Splash - Candy Garden 3 - begin a new journey and an amazing quest in the world of vegetables,farms and smash or match all the strawberries all together.The game contains Aubergine,cherries,loops,apples,banana.You will be amazed of the heaven full of plumes in candyland and your heart will melt and blossom at the same time!Harvest all the pumpkin pie and crush them and you will be the master of this game!Sugarland and fruityland are now one and they are Juicy than ever before.You will gain bonuses when the flowers will fall from the scoreboard and give you massive combos.Protect your yard from hateful bugs and match the salads 3 or more of the same color and also play with your little pets.Swipe and match lemons or mango which give you more points, also the watermelon,olives and oranges give you more combos.

Fruit Splash - Candy Garden 3 - Pop the Levels and share your results on facebook with your friends, they will now know who the boss is! Get more than 2 stars to unlock new levels and bonuses! Enjoy colorful levels and prepare to be amazed of the amazing journey in candyland.This arcade puzzle game lets you move from easy levels to more complex levels, so the gameplay is always getting better and better and you will collect more experience and lots of surprises! The main objective of the game is to match the little pears,peanuts,tomato and pineapple 3 in a row or more either by horrizontal or vertical.If you get 5 in a row, you will get a special color bomb which is very powerful in destroying the fruits,licorice,turnip and getting tons of bonuses!Make 3 way dash with your fingers and win them all!

Fruit Splash - Candy Garden 3 - Features:
• Juicy nuts,carrots,cherry your little kids will love playing with the Broccoli and will blow their minds with awesome game effects!
• Over 100+ breath taking levels
• Candy frenzy game style with lots of combos and explosion!
• Lots of game goals, move mode, time mode, collect ingredients mode, etc.
• Surreal graphics, you will want to eat the cotton candy and the jellies in this game!
• Match same colors berries in your free time and relax playing a super puzzle game!

How To Play:
- Match and crush 3 crops or more to gain new points
- Crush 4 candy grass in a line to create a special candy garlic which sends waves of lightning!
- Crush 5 candy grapes in a line to create a multi-color blossom combo which explodes other kiwi in the game when combined and bursts lightning thunder bolts
- Pop 2 special bonbon beans to blaze a big part of the salad candies!
- Enjoy this Fruit Saga and become a master of the pumpkin cookies!
- You will find incredible surrealism in the game!

Play with the jelly splash and smash the fruits! The jelly smash will make you feel invincible and you will make some big combos in crashing them all!

Enjoy this quest and become a guru of the farm planting and harvesting the crops.
Thank you for downloading our game!
